rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: I found a python book., word: python
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single word, 'NN', which is a valid part-of-speech tag listed in the provided description. The output adheres to the requirement of returning only the part-of-speech tag.
OK
